attributes.action: make councils provide specialist housing for disabled children with more than two siblings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: for each council to have to provide disabled adapted properties which cater for the needs of disabled child/ren who have more than one brother or sister, rather than families in this situation having to wait years for a house that is only nearly suitable, or two houses together which is unsuitable on the families recourses and causes untold stresses on the main carer who stays at home, everyone regardless of who is disabled or how many in the family unit should have the right to live in a home suitable to each person in that family unit
